articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Singapore tightens monetary policy; Asia markets rise as more data shows U.S. inflation cooling - CNBC
articles.description: Asian markets trade higher as they see retail sales data out of Japan and Australia
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets largely rose on Friday, following the moves of Wall Street as the U.S. producer price index signaled further signs of cooling inflation.
